original: Yo dukkhasaccaṁ parijānāti so samudayasaccaṁ pajahitthāti? No.
Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṁ pajahittha so dukkhasaccaṁ parijānātīti? No.
Yo dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānāti so samudayasaccaṁ nappajahitthāti?
Arahā dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānāti, no ca samudayasaccaṁ nappajahittha. Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca
analyzed: ▁arahā ▁dukkhasacc aṃ ▁na ▁parijānāti ▁no ▁ca ▁samudayasaccaṃ ▁na ppajah ittha ▁aggamagg a samaṃgi ñca

original: arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā dukkhasaccañca na parijānanti samudayasaccañca nappajahittha.
analyzed: ▁arahant añca ▁ṭhapetvā ▁avases ā ▁puggal ā ▁dukkhasacc añca ▁na ▁pari jān anti ▁samuday a sacc añca ▁na ppajah ittha

original: Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṁ nappajahittha so dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānātīti?
analyzed: ▁yo ▁vā ▁pana ▁samudayasaccaṃ ▁na ppajah ittha ▁so ▁dukkhasacc aṃ ▁na ▁pari jān ā tīti

original: Aggamaggasamaṅgī samudayasaccaṁ nappajahittha, no ca dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānāti.
Aggamaggasamaṅgiñca arahantañca ṭhapetvā avasesā puggalā samudayasaccañca nappajahittha
analyzed: ▁aggamagg a samaṃgi ñca ▁arahant añca ▁ṭhapetvā ▁avases ā ▁puggal ā ▁samuday a sacc añca ▁na ppajah ittha
